version_description:
- Remove music casting feature (not many users cast music to tv)
- Add youtube casting feature (much more useful than music casting)
- Update mirror to LG tv
- Update mirror to Samsung tv (without audio)
- Update horizontal screenshot for better presentation on iOS 12+ App Store

- Update screenshot for iPhone 6.5" to match with Upcoming Requirements starting from March 27, 2019
- Users can use mirroring 1 time for free to test mirroring quality of our app, afterthat they need to pay

Continuous app quality improvement:
- Improve photo casting speed to TV
- Fix issue when connecting app to LG tv
- FIx issue not loading photos & videos when launching app for the first time
- Add cross promotion among apps of LQL Studio
- Update contact email address
- Remove Rate App from Settings

- Users can do youtube, videos & photos cast for 10 times for free everyday
- To use all functions unlimited, users need to subscribe our weekly subscription with 7 days free trial

- Bug fix: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy not shown on Settings and Subscription screen
- Users able to browse videos, photos or youtube before connecting to TV

- Update subscription screen UI
- Bug fix: much delay for first 2 times right after free trial subscription
- Bug fix: not cast photos to several Samsung tv model
- Add slideshow into photo cast function
- Add admob ads
- Bug fix: switch many videos when casting
- Improve UX to cast youtube videos to TV
- Add function to turn on/off sound when mirroring in Settings
- Remove cross promotion because proven not effective for our apps

- Important update: now users can cast ANY WEB VIDEOS their Samsung, LG or Roku tv
- Remove admob ads

- Update slideshows in subscription screen
- Update keyword list

- IMPORTANT UPDATE: new OPTIMIZE SPEED mode for screen mirroring with 0s latency for Samsung and LG, but a bit lower screen resolution
- Update keyword list

- Update screenshots for better promotion our app on App Store
- Add more pricing options for our users
- Update description

- Update screenshot #1
- Update keyword lists when the current keyword lists are proven not effective

- Fix UI scaling bug on iPad
- Update subscription screen
- Change subscription screen back to the subscription screen of version 2.6 when the current subscription screen is proven not effective
- Add admob ads
- Remove interstitial ads to avoid disturbing users

- Update subscription screen and flow
- Users able to use all functions for 3 days for free
- After that 3 days, if they satisfy with our app quality, they need to subscribe to our monthly or yearly subscription to continue using

- Remove all Admob banner ads
- Add FAQ & Contact Us to Settings to help users easier to cancel subscription or request refund
- Update subscription screen with clear price right on subscription button
- We get some bad reviews from users for the current pricing options, so I submit this update to change the subscription screen back to version 2.12

- Add slideshow into the header of subscription screen
- Fix bug: users sometime cannot click on free trial button at the first impression of subscription screen after app launching
- Fix UX bug: rating popup constantly shows in all screens

- After we update to the new style of showing rating popup in our version 2.16, we check Apple guidelines carefully one more time, and we worry that this new style many not follow Apple guidelines. So I submit this update to change the style of showing rating popup back to versions before 2.16 to make sure our app strictly follow all Apple guidelines
- Fix bug: users cannot use photos and videos casting after buying lifetime purchase

- Update screenshot
- Improve the app stability
- Minor bug fixing
- Add facebook & firebase sdk to the app to have more insights to users' data

- Fix crashing bug when casting video on iOS 13
- Improve quality of Optimize Speed mode
- Improve quality of the app when rotating iPhone/iPad screen

- Show admob ads on the app
- Adjust Screen Cast screen to help users able to cast their screen if the app couldn't automatically cast screen in some cases

- Fix some minor bugs
- Update app description

- Remove Admob interstitial ads to avoid disturbing users
- Update app screenshot
- Update screenshots
- Update iPad screenshots

- Update web browser of Web Video Cast function to make it easier to use
- Fix Dark Mode UI bug for iOS 13
- Bug fix: sometimes the app couldn't get IP address for Optimize Speed mode of Screen Cast function
- Add instructions to Settings to help users mirror screen when they have latest Samsung or LG tv models
- We has continuously worked hard to make the app better update by update. For the update, we fix some minor bugs which we find out with our internal testing.
- Update subscription screen to make clear billing price
- Update subscription screen

Important updates
- Support landscape mode for Optimize Quality Screen Cast
- Automatically start the server for Optimize Speed mode

Significant update for Web Video Cast function
- Multitab for in-app web browser
- Back, forward, refresh button
- Users are able to edit web address right on web view
- We get an email from a client that he cannot back to the app from FAQ screen, so I submit this version urgently to fix that bug

- Improve the quality of Optimize Quality mode, the popular delay decreases to 4-5s
- Support more old TV models
- Fix crash bug when mirroring, now the app rarely crashes when mirroring screen
- Fix crash bug when enabling mirror audio
- Add promotional metadata to free trial weekly subscription
- Promotional metadata for IAP is still In Review status, even though I revise the promotional metadata per your feedback and get approval. So I submit this update to try to fix it.
- Fix tv discovering bugs for new tv models
- Continuously fix bugs and improve app performance
- Continuously improve app performance and fix bugs
- Change IAP screen UI
